awards.text: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 15 nominations.

fullplot: Dramatized version of the story of CNN's Gulf War coverage featuring "The Boys from Baghdad": the battle over access, the fight to keep the technology up and running.. and the decision whether to risk their lives behind enemy lines once the bombing starts, in order to get the story of a lifetime.
plot: A group of CNN reporters wrestle with journalistic ethics and the life-and-death perils of reporting during the Gulf War.
title: Live from Baghdad
